author: Loulla-Mae Eleftheriou-Smith
description: The suspected terrorist attack at Manchester Arena on Monday night that left 22 people dead and at least 59 injured took placeÂ four years to the day since the murder of Fusilier Lee Rigby.
title: Manchester attack comes four years to the day since the murder of Lee Rigby

author: Lucy Clarke-Billings
description: The appalling massacre - which has left at least 22 people dead - took place on the same day as the fusilier was butchered by Islamic extremists Michael Adebolajo and Michael Adebowale
title: Manchester terror attack happened on anniversary of Lee Rigby's brutal murder
